foreignData.name: Ausgräber
foreignData.text: {T}, opfere ein Standardland: Eine Kreatur Deiner Wahl erhält Landtarnungsfähigkeit für den Typ dieses Landes bis zum Ende des Zuges.

name: Excavator
originalText:
oc
T, Sacrifice a basic land: Target creature gains that landwalk ability until end of turn. (If defending player controls any lands of that type, this creature is unblockable.)

rulings.text: If a land with the supertype “basic” somehow has multiple subtypes, then the creature will gain landwalk of all those types.

text: {T}, Sacrifice a basic land: Target creature gains landwalk of each of the land types of the sacrificed land until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a land of any of those types.)
